Judul: BUSINESS  STRATEGY DEVELOPMENT OF INTEGRATED DIGITAL BUSINESS SOLUTION FOR SME IN INDONESIA
Abstrak:
SME has an important and strategic role in national economic development. By 2017 the number of SMEs in Indonesia is estimated to grow more than 59,000,000 units spread over 34 provinces, among 16,056 islands. It becomes a challenge for the Indonesian government to unite them in one digital ecosystem. Nowadays, in a global and digital era, it is very critical for a business having an online, if do not exist mean they will vanish.  

Developing social impact for Indonesian SMEs is the main objective of this final project. From a theoretical perspective and considering its advantages and disadvantages, provide an overview of the goals and objectives of the thesis is the first step. Secondly, analyze the macro environment of SME itself and a glimpse of digital business. Finally all the value chains are integrated into the proposed conclusion. To build a strong Indonesian SMEs and able to increase the prosperity of the nation then SMEs need to get a variety of support including extensive marketing, not only domestically but also global. The scale of business should also be developed by increasing working capital through easy financing model accordance with the character of SMEs themselves. Skills and knowledge must be developed, support from the government is a must. Through the integrated SME digital business all of the above can be achieved. The research approach used in this thesis is deductive, in which the theory and hypothesis is developed and a research is designed to test the hypothesis. The main research method carried out is qualitative, in which several interviews were conducted with a SME regulator, marketer or blogger in Indonesia and with the business owner of SME in Indonesia to learn about their needs and difficulties in running their business and also the possibilities of integrated solution thru digital channel. The business was greatly improved as a result of advice from the interviewees. 

The results indicate that the niche market for the business strategy development idea is reachable. In order to be the most beneficial for the SME, customer, business partner, and government as the regulator or policy maker as well, the business needs to differentiate itself from the conventional or as-is model to the easies, fastest, cheapest, and effective by creating a superior business channel thru digital platform focused on one stop solution excellent service values. This thesis research methodology by collecting qualitative data with interviews and observations. For solutions and recommendations, a web-based SME digital business will be the proposal to open the door of opportunity for SME in today's digital and global era. 

For solution and recommendation, web-based integrated system as a components interrelationship will balance the performance, productivity, resources, and create many opportunities for all SME stakeholders. The business model will be the breakthrough as the first integrated digital business solution for the SME in Indonesia.
Kata Kunci: Business Strategy Development, SME Digital Business, SME Indonesia
